name: E-3PO (V)
Lore: 'Brought to Cloud City by the Empire. Facilitates Imperial-to-alien cummunication. Relayed carbonite chamber modifiation instructions to Ugloste. Arrogant. Rude. Vulgar.',
Text: 'While with C-3PO, C-3PO''s game text (and game text of cards on him) is canceled. E Chu Ta is destiny +3 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. During any control phase, may take E Chu Ta into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
